# Edge cases and special patterns for go install

# 1. Different spacing
go install    github.com/golangci/golangci-lint/cmd/golangci-lint@latest
go  install github.com/golangci/golangci-lint/cmd/golangci-lint@latest
go	install	github.com/golangci/golangci-lint/cmd/golangci-lint@latest

# 2. Multiple flags
go install -v -trimpath -ldflags="-s -w" github.com/goreleaser/goreleaser@latest
go install -tags=extended github.com/gohugoio/hugo@latest
go install -race github.com/cosmtrek/air@latest

# 3. Module paths with numbers and special chars
go install github.com/99designs/gqlgen@latest
go install github.com/securego/gosec/v2/cmd/gosec@latest
go install gopkg.in/yaml.v3@latest
go install k8s.io/kubectl@latest

# 4. Different version formats
go install github.com/golangci/golangci-lint/cmd/golangci-lint@v1.64.8
go install github.com/golangci/golangci-lint/cmd/golangci-lint@latest
go install github.com/golangci/golangci-lint/cmd/golangci-lint@master
go install github.com/golangci/golangci-lint/cmd/golangci-lint@main
go install github.com/golangci/golangci-lint/cmd/golangci-lint@v1.64.8-rc1
go install github.com/golangci/golangci-lint/cmd/golangci-lint@v0.0.0-20230101120000-abcdef123456

# 5. No version (implicitly latest)
go install github.com/air-verse/air
go install golang.org/x/tools/cmd/goimports

# 6. With inline comments (not pinned comments)
go install github.com/golangci/golangci-lint/cmd/golangci-lint@latest # linter
go install golang.org/x/tools/cmd/goimports@latest  # import formatter
go install github.com/securego/gosec/v2/cmd/gosec@latest	# security

# 7. Already pinned versions (should not change unless update mode)
go install github.com/golangci/golangci-lint/cmd/golangci-lint@v1.61.0
go install golang.org/x/tools/cmd/stringer@v0.27.0

# 8. Subpackages
go install github.com/golangci/golangci-lint/cmd/golangci-lint@latest
go install golang.org/x/tools/cmd/goimports@latest
go install github.com/golang/protobuf/protoc-gen-go@latest

# 9. Similar but different modules
go install github.com/cosmtrek/air@latest
go install github.com/air-verse/air@latest

# 10. Case sensitivity
go install github.com/GoLang/ExampleTool@latest
go install github.com/Golang/Example-Tool@latest

# 11. Long module paths
go install github.com/organization/repository/cmd/tool/subcommand@latest

# 12. Hyphens and underscores
go install github.com/my-org/my-tool@latest
go install github.com/my_org/my_tool@latest
go install github.com/org-name/tool_name@latest
